item.title: Tunnista aikamuoto
item.description: function Quiz(questions) { this.score = 0; this.questions = questions; this.questionIndex = 0; } Quiz.prototype.getQuestionIndex = function() { return this.questions[this.questionIndex]; } Quiz.prototype.guess = function(answer) { if (this.getQuestionIndex().isCorrectAnswer(answer)) { this.score++; } else { displayFinalMessage();} this.questionIndex++; } Quiz.prototype.isEnded = function() { return this.questionIndex === this.questions.length; } function startOver() { location.reload(true); } function Question(text, choices, answer) { this.text = text; this.choices = choices; this.answer = answer; } Question.

item.title: Kokoavat: kirjoita 1
item.description: Täydennä aikamuodot. Michael Jordan    (oli ollut) out of work for a while when he finally    (sai) a new job at Kemi Shipping. He    (ei ollut suunnitellut) to remain unemployed for long. After all, he    (oli onnistunut) to get a good job in the basketball business after graduating from the University of Kemi in 2014. - How    (menetit) your job? You were an NBA allstar.

item.title: Kokoavat: Olla-verbi kirjoita 1
item.description: Täydennä olla-verbi oikeassa muodossa. I    (olen) friends with someone who    (on) the weirdest dreams. She    (on ollut) them for several years now. We usually    (on) so much fun together, but when she starts talking about her dreams, she gives me the creeps. Another problem is that I    (olen) deeply in love with her. Ok, I admit, that makes us more than just friends. Don't get me wrong, she    (on) an amazing person and we    (on) so much in common.

item.title: Preesens: Kirjoita 1
item.description: Kirjoita lauseisiin yleis- tai kestopreesensmuodot. 1. Jackson often    (ottaa) a nap while watching the 5 o'clock news. 2. Even now he    (nukkuu) on the couch. He has no idea what's happening on TV. 3.    (Tiedätkö) where the nearest coffee shop is? 4. No, sorry,    (en tiedä). 5. Henrik   (tapaa) his therapist this afternoon - he's really nervous already!

item.title: Preesens: Kirjoita 2
item.description: Kirjoita lauseisiin yleis- tai kestopreesensmuodot. 1. We usually    (grow) tomatoes in our backyard, but this year we    (grow, not) any. 2. Hurry up man! The bus   (come) and we    (want, not) to miss it. 3. I    (usually, go) to school by bike, but tomorrow I'll be driving my dad's new Toyota. 4. Can you see Jorma and Pasi over there?

item.title: Täydennä kolmas muoto
item.description: Täydennä kolmas muoto annetusta verbistä. Kun vastaat oikein, verbien lista täydentyy. go Check .verb-container { display: flex; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-top: 0.5em; } div#tehtava { padding-left: 4em; } .verb { margin-right: 5px; } .verb-list { margin-right: 5px; } input { padding: 5px; margin-right: 5px; margin-left: 0.7em; width: 7em; } .dark input{ background-color: #181A1B; padding: 5px; margin-right: 5px; margin-left: 0.7em; width: 7em; } .check-btn { padding: 5px 10px; color: white; border: none; cursor: pointer; background-color: #1F2937; border-radius: 5px; } .
